reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, hitting just above the knee, and appreciate its style, with one noting it looks expensive. The material receives positive feedback for being fantastic and comfortable, and customers like the color options, with one mentioning the darker shades aren't see-through. While some the sizing is accurate, others find it runs big, and opinions about the length are divided between those who find it perfect and those who say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flatters Fluffy
items.body: Fantastic dress! Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and 165 pounds and this dress flattered me. Plenty of room to move without accenting puff stomach or wide behind. Cute with boots and accessories. I bought both blue and green. Planning to buy a third to get through the holidays. I do wish it had a thin liner bc if light hits just the right angle itâ€™s see through. Overall great dress!! Read more
items.author: Smahr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, elegant dress for work, evening wear or wedding wear
items.body: Beautiful dress just did not fit my body. To me it ran larger than the size. Beautiful color. Wish I could have worn it. Material was very soft and it was hand or express light wash cold, tumble on low heat if I remember correctly. Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress but a bit pricy for the quality!
items.body: Love the dress â™¥ï¸the fabric is thick enough but not too much, itâ€™s a good fabric relevantly! Since you iron it once after sitting on it it doesnâ€™t crease. I chose the BO- Rosy colour and loving it! Itâ€™s very vibrant also comfy and cool on warm days. I also loved the little details on the sleeves. It was true to size and fit nicely. The only reason I give it 4 stars is bc I thought the price is on the higher side for the quality otherwise all together I really love the dress. ðŸ‘— Read more
items.author: Sasha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best v neck short sleeve dress
items.body: Very nice dress. Looks great and quality is nice. Lots of color options and I would like to own all the colors. Favorite dress. Nice fit and it has pockets. Read more
items.author: Matthew Henry

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles are a problem
items.body: The only negative about this dress is the packaging wrinkles. After washing and a quick spin in the dryer, I hung dry as I do with all my clothes. No change in the original condition. So I tried some wrinkle release and steaming. Slightly better but still some obvious package creases. Another wash, more wrinkle release and the creases are still there. The next step is ironing but means finding the iron. Otherwise the dress is cute and flattering. Read more
items.author: Christine Novak

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy Nana
items.body: fit great and oh so comfortable..Once I ironed out wrinkles from shipping pkg ... dress did not wrinkle at all.. I wore to granddaughters outdoor wedding and felt so pretty.. Read more
items.author: Billie Stellato

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: Great dress, cute and comfortable. Many compliments on style and color. Sometime I wear a small, sometimes a medium. The medium fit better is this dress. Read more
items.author: Catherine M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad dress for the price
items.body: First bought the black dress. Fits nice, flatters Grandma. My daughter liked it so much, gave it to her. Decided to buy the green one for myself. When it arrived there was no makers tag, no size tag, looks like it may have be worn. The front pulls up making the hem uneven. It was received in the green stripe ready to ship bag, not the makers packaging. Getting tired of receiving someone else's returns. Read more
items.author: Vee P

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C2-blue White, C2-blue Flower2, B1-dark Green, Polka Dots Blue, C2-leopard, C2-orange Floral, B0-rosy, B-indigo, Satin Gray, C2-sky Blue White, Swiss Black, B1-red, C2-blue Flowers, B-wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
